GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.136
GSD.description:
crypto: arm64/poly1305 - fix a read out-of-bound

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.136 by commit 3c77292d52b341831cb09c24ca4112a1e4f9e91f, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit f569ca16475155013525686d0f73bc379c67e635. For more details please see the references link.
